entity:AbyssalCall.NAME: Abyssal Call
entity:AbyssalCall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Add !M! Void cards into your discard pile.
entity:AbyssalCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

entity:VoidBlast.NAME: Void Blast
entity:VoidBlast.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. Deal !D! damage.
entity:VoidBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

entity:SharedFate.NAME: Shared Fate
entity:SharedFate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:F! entity:Flux. Apply !entity:F! entity:Flux to all enemies.

entity:Otherworldly.NAME: Otherworldly
entity:Otherworldly.DESCRIPTION: At start of turn, apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. Gain !entity:A! Artifact.

entity:VoidPulse.NAME: Void Pulse
entity:VoidPulse.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Void, gain !B! Block.

entity:VoidWeave.NAME: Void Weave
entity:VoidWeave.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Void, gain [R].
entity:VoidWeave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Void, gain [R] [R].
